title: OpenSSL security advisory (AV26-058)
description: On January 27, 2026, OpenSSL published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: OpenSSL  versions 3.6.0 to versions prior to 3.6.1
OpenSSL  versions 3.5.0 to versions prior to 3.5.5
OpenSSL  versions 3.4.0 to versions prior to 3.4.4
OpenSSL  versions 3.3.0 to versions prior to 3.3.6
OpenSSL  versions 3.0.0 to versions prior to 3.0.19
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
